body_html: Could you add entries like these instead of changing the modules? First argument is module name, others are attributes that will be set to None if they're not present. Thanks!
body_text: Could you add entries like these instead of changing the modules? First argument is module name, others are attributes that will be set to None if they're not present. Thanks!
body: Could you add entries like [these](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/utils/serialization/read_lua_file.py#L354) instead of changing the modules? First argument is module name, others are attributes that will be set to `None` if they're not present. Thanks!
